title: Stupid increase in ping OUT OF NOWHERE
body: So in this last couple of weeks for some unknown reason I've been experiencing A DRAMATIC increase in my bloody ping. I usually play on 38 ping with no interruptions BUT NOW my ping is suddenly 120 ping ON EVERY SINGLE GAME. I can't play with this bullshit and I've already lost many games including ranks due to this. Yes I've turned off my router and my computer is wireless not wired. Is their anything that riot can do to fix this? Or something I can do.

replies.body: It's probably the servers. Wait a bit and see if they improve. Riot should have noticed by now.
Yea i'm on Fibre (Orcon ISP) and i usually get 40ms, i'm getting a constant 240ms now, unplayable.
